This is a first, for me anyway. A message from the future?
"This is Wurlitzer from the future"  Sounds musical.
Dave

--- vfp19968@... wrote:

From: " RetroCom" <vfp19968@...>
To: <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] FM Sweep & Optical Microphone
Date: Wed, 4 Apr 2007 17:19:33 -0700

Yep, I get the religious messages from time to time, not everytime. I got this one today and the person sounds very stressed. I can say I have never heard anything like this before.
"Transmitter sucks, but we're desperate!"

Dave

--- franks-boxes@... wrote:

From: "Frank Sumption" <franks-boxes@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] FM Sweep & Optical Microphone
Date: Wed, 04 Apr 2007 16:01:55 -0600

I can hear those. I always wonder about the religious aspects. I tended to 
disregard it most of my life, but the voices mention it sometimes, and I had 
a "jesus" image show up on my shower window over the past week.

Frank
